Package settings

Class Summary
availableProject Handle data about availableProjects coming from BCID
availableProjectsFetcher Fetch publicly availableProjects from the BCID system
bcidConnector General purpose class for authenticating against BCID system and creating BCIDs.
Connection Represents a database connection, can be used to generate a JDBC URL, make a new D2RQ Database or generate a D2RQ Mapping entry.
deepRoots A class to manage deep Roots, storing metadata about the links and information regarding concepts and roots for each deep link specified.
deepRootsReader A sample for reading a deepLinks data file in JSON.
fimsInputter Abstract class for printing output in a variety of situations.
fimsPrinter Abstract class for printing output in a variety of situations.
forceInputter Always force a positive response
hasher Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
IntuitiveStringComparator A comparator that emulates the "intuitive" sorting used by Windows Explorer.
PathManager Manage input/output path designations.
RegEx Facilitate regular expressions
secureFilter Filter which checks for the user in the session, if no user is present, the redirect to login page
standardInputter Allows us to read from Standard In, always using Y/y as a positive response
standardPrinter Send output to fimsPrinter.out (for command-line applications)
 

Enum Summary
DBsystem Enumerates supported database systems with their JDBC drivers.
 

Exception Summary
FIMSException Exception class for handling FIMS Exceptions, which will be bubbled up to the calling classes and handled appropriate in a simple dialog box.
NotAuthorizedException Exception class for catching 401 responses.
